name: Allow Me To Sleep
description:
Allow me to sleep is a first-person indie horror, was developed by one person in 10 days. This is a short game about 10 minutes.

                                                              GamePlay
You are playing as Mike who got insomnia. The game takes place in a house, play at your own risk. Warning: The game contains some jumpscares, if you have heart disease please avoid to play this game.

                                                 How To Play

                                            Movement: W,A,S,D
                                            Interact: Left mouse button
                                            Crouch: Left control
                                            Sprint: Left shift
